title: Sovereign AGI Remediation Execution Plan
description: Schema for the generated, runtime-specific execution plan object, derived from a static Playbook and dynamic inputs.

plan_id.description: Unique ID for this specific execution attempt.

playbook_reference.description: The ID of the Playbook from the catalog being executed.

target_instance.description: The specific asset or resource targeted by this plan.

runtime_inputs.description:
Dynamic variables required by the playbook steps (e.g., CVE ID, patched version string, specific port).
       This ensures separation of static playbook logic and dynamic execution data.

step_params.description: Final resolved parameters after template processing.
